column5: Would you like to learn how to deliver value to customers and build sustainable relationships? Then this double degree programme is for you!The double degree programme combines the expertise in Marketing Analytics and Data Science (MADS) from Groningen with the expertise on Strategic Marketing from the BI Norwegian Business school in Oslo.In Groningen, you will study thoroughly methods that allow you to analyse and model (secondary, big) data to track the marketing performance of the firm and generate new customer insights. The information and insights generated by the Marketing Analytics and Data Science profile are used as a basis for making research-based strategic and tactical marketing decisions.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
